snippet: Japan Airlines has set the price of its initial public offering at a level that would make the listing the world's second-largest I.P.O this year after that of Facebook.
abstract: Japan Airlines has set the price of its initial public offering at a level that would make the listing the world's second-largest I.P.O this year after that of Facebook.

headline.main: JAL Aims to Raise $8.5 Billion in I.P.O.
headline.print_headline: In I.P.O., Japan Airlines Aims for Valuation of $8.5 Billion
